name: Triangular Problem Demo
description:
Hello!

In this little game you will play a Triangle (Green), you'll need to kill all enemies to gain xp/money to upgrade your triangle.

NOTE: The game is still in Alpha, the upgrade system is not ready yet!! 

The song used in the game is a non copyrighted song you can find on youtube:

'jeremy blake - powerup! ♫ no copyright 8-bit music'

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7SwiFWOQqM
